column14: As a staff, I want to generate receipt so that the customer can take it as a proved that payment had made.
column23: A print task is sent to printer

column14: As a staff, I want to generate bus ticket so that I can print out to customer as a reference and board our bus through the ticket.

column19: Order ID, trip no, origin, destination, trip price , seat number and total amount payment is displayed
column23: Cash change is calculated automatically and displayed on the text field

column14: As a staff, I want to change the bus ticket so that I can help the customer to change when the customer requested.

column23: Select new trip by choosing the trip number
column25: New departure date and departure time for new trip is displayed on the textfields
column27: New seat number is assigned automatically

column14: As a staff, I want to have seat selection so that I can choose the seat for customer.

column23: Blue indicate available seat, green indicate occupied seat while red indicate unavailable seat while the unavailable seat's bus ticket has been sold out

column14: As a staff, I want to view the available transport route schedule everyday so that I can tell the customer which route is available.

column14: As a staff, I am able to view all route information which displayed in the table so that i get to identify the origin and destination for each route easily.

column21: Corresponding route information will displayed in the table
